title: Taric Jg
body: What do you guys think about Taric Jg?

replies.body:
Old taric in jg was beast among beasts.

New taric jg = {{item:1402}} {{item:3042}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3110}}  = opp
I like it, I find it pretty fun
He's okay in that he has sustain and decent clear but doesn't really bring anything to the table compared to other junglers.
Slow clear and very mana dependent, gank's are okay. Could be played but don't expect much
